tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_reports ( 
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    staff_id INT REFERENCES warehouse_staff(staff_id), 
    report_date DATE, 
    total_orders_completed INT, 
    total_hours_worked DECIMAL(10,2) 
);
CREATE TABLE warehouse_staff (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, position STRING, manager_id INT);
CREATE TABLE performance_reports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, staff_id INT, report_date DATE, score INT, comments STRING);
CREATE TABLE staff_managers (manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, position STRING);

CREATE TABLE ShiftSchedule (
  shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_id INT,
  shift_date DATE,
  shift_start_time TIME,
  shift_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE warehouse_staff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    staff_name STRING,
    performance_rating FLOAT
)
